amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to prohibiting legislation that would increase taxes on small businesses during any period in which a national emergency has been declared with respect to a pandemic.

vote.text: Amendment SA 69 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 100 - 0. Record Vote Number: 16.

action.text: Amendment SA 69 proposed by Senator Rubio. (consideration: CR S433-434; text: CR S433) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to prohibiting legislation that would increase taxes on small businesses during any period in which a national emergency has been declared with respect to a pandemic.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 69 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 100 - 0. Record Vote Number: 16.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 69 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 100 - 0. Record Vote Number: 16.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 69 proposed by Senator Rubio.
